modName: I See Fire by -Ed Sheeran- Main Menu Music Version 1
summary:
This is the version 1 of the I See Fire song main menu music that I use personally. I do not own this music.
Slightly edited from the original, gain and bass is higher, added slight echo and deeper pitch. Plus faded out at the end.
descriptionHtml:
Legal, please read /
____________________________________________________________________________
BEFORE YOU DOWNLOAD, YOU MUST UNDERSTAND, I DO NOT OWN THIS MUSIC.

This is the original: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2fngvQS_PmQ&feature=kp
I AM NOT GAINING ANY MONEY BY RE-UPLOADING A FILE WHICH HAS BEEN VIEWED
AND DOWNLOADED OVER 24 MILLION PEOPLE ON YOUTUBE.
____________________________________________________________________________

This mod simply replaces the normal main menu music which was good...but I
prefer this track better.

Only thing I edited from the original version was slightly increased echo and
bass gain, plus a fade out at the end and slightly deeper pitch.

This is my first file, be sure to endorse if you enjoyed it, or freak out in the
comment section if you hate it. =P

Enjoy the mod!
~459pm
author: Ed Sheeran
